result.markdown: --- title: "Week 5: Efficient reproducible workflows with targets and renv" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * [targets](https://books.ropensci.org/targets/) * [renv](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/) ## Slides for week Download pdf ## Assignments * [Assignment 2](../assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Friday 04 April. * [Assignment 3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Thursday 17 April.
